ModelProduct.tablename: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.get_car_price(price_from integer, price_to integer) RETURNS integer LANGUAGE plpgsql AS $function$ Declare Car_count integer; Begin select count(*) into Car_count from Car where Car_price between Price_from and Price_to; return Car_count; End; $function$ _T

CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE public.update_working_performed(IN client integer) LANGUAGE plpgsql AS $procedure$ declare begin
INSERT INTO public.working_time_performed( portal_id, portal_code, customer_id, client_id, country_prefix, status, created_at, working_performed_id, member_id, working_mode, resource_id, from_lat, from_lon, from_address, to_lat, to_lon, to_address, login_workingtime, logout_workingtime, service_provider_id, remark) SELECT portal_id, portal_code, customer_id, client_id, country_prefix, status,created_at, working_id, member_id, working_mode,resource_id, from_lat,from_lon, from_address, to_lat, to_lon, to_address, from_workingtime, to_workingtime, service_provider_id, remark FROM public.working_time where client_id = client; end $procedure$ _T
